abstract: By 6 p.m Tuesday in front of The Lodge at Sun Valley, a clutch of photographers and reporters were recording the arrivals. It was a rope line without a rope, a red carpet with no carpet.
lead_paragraph: By 6 p.m Tuesday in front of The Lodge at Sun Valley, a clutch of photographers and reporters were recording the arrivals. It was a rope line without a rope, a red carpet with no carpet.

headline.main: Sun Valley: Pop Goes the Razzi
